HDR.HEADER_EN: EACH CONTAINER, WHEN RECONSTITUTED, YIELDS APPROXIMATELY XX x XX mL SERVINGS./CHAQUE RÉCIPIENT, LORSQUE RECONSTITUÉ, DONNE ENVIRON XX PORTIONS DE XX mL.
